translation.en: Here are those ETFs.

translation.en: -Intern? -My name's Bo.

translation.en: Cover Rick's phone. I'm gonna get lunch. All right?
translation.zh: 去帮瑞克接电话 我去买午饭 好吗？

translation.en: Don't pee, don't zone out, don't sneeze. Just cover his phones, try not to exist.

translation.en: And slather my dick in ink and use it to write the hieroglyphic for "no."

translation.en: Oh, shit.

translation.en: Rick?

translation.en: you could have made the playoffs.

translation.en: I wanna have an article on her site someday.

translation.en: Like buying thousand-dollar throw blankets and... sleeping with my computer.

translation.en: That's why she's so mean. She's sleeping with a laptop. She needs to get laid.

translation.en: -She needs to be made love to. -Well, Rick needs to get laid.

translation.en: The two of them are always in this office. Let's lock them together
translation.zh: 这俩人总待在办公室可以把他们关到一起

translation.en: so they can have sex with each other.

translation.en: And then when they're boning, we're free.

translation.en: All I care about is that I'm not still an assistant when I'm 28 years old.

translation.en: That's when it gets really sad.

translation.en: -I'm 28. -I'm so sorry. [chuckles]

translation.en: -For you. That's sad for you. -You should leave.

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -I made something. -What--?

translation.en: You're so quiet. You move like a Prius.

translation.en: -What is that? -It's a spreadsheet
translation.zh: -这是什么？-一张表格

translation.en: of everything I know about Kirsten.
translation.zh: 列出了我知道的所有关于克尔斯汀的事

translation.en: -What she likes, doesn't like. -I have no idea what this is for.
translation.zh: -她喜欢什么 不喜欢什么-搞不懂你弄这个干什么？

translation.en: To set them up.

translation.en: For our Cyrano.
translation.zh: 为了我们的情圣助攻

translation.en: -That was a joke. -But it doesn't have to be.

translation.en: -What's Rick's favorite food? -The filet from Ai Fiori's.

translation.en: -Where will he be at 3? -His son's school play.
translation.zh: -三点钟时他会在哪？-去他儿子学校看戏剧表演

translation.en: -Hey, what does he hate? -"Geoff" spelled with G and sour cream.
translation.zh: -他讨厌什么？-用字母G拼写“杰夫”和酸奶油

translation.en: We know everything about them. What they like.
translation.zh: 我们了解老板的一切知道他们喜欢的 讨厌的

translation.en: We control their entire schedule. We are the men behind the curtain.
translation.zh: 我们掌控他们的所有日程我们就是幕后操纵者

translation.en: We can get them to do anything.

translation.en: -This is very thorough. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -列得很详尽-谢谢

translation.en: -Absolutely not. -What?
translation.zh: -绝对不要-什么？

translation.en: -I thought-- -This is insane.
translation.zh: -我以为…-这简直是疯了

translation.en: I barely have time to do my job.

translation.en: -If Rick found out, he'd fire me. -He'd never find out.

translation.en: -This could save us. -I gotta take my girlfriend to lunch.
translation.zh: -这能拯救我们-我要带女朋友去吃午餐了

translation.en: -Should I send this to you? -Please don't.

translation.en: Oh, Suze.
translation.zh: 苏丝

translation.en: Suze.
translation.zh: 苏丝

translation.en: -I thought we were getting lunch. -Excuse me. Are those seats taken?
translation.zh: -不是说去吃午餐的吗？-不好意思 这几个座位有人吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. They're taken.
translation.zh: 有 不好意思 已经被占了

translation.en: Yeah, I know we were.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Rick needed me to save the seats. His son's the second lead.
translation.zh: 瑞克要我帮他占座 他儿子演男二号

translation.en: I thought we could do a theater picnic.
translation.zh: 我想着我们可以来个剧场野餐

translation.en: Hey, you look amazing. How'd the, uh, thing go this morning?
translation.zh: 你今天真漂亮 早上还顺利吗？

translation.en: Good. I booked that Old Navy campaign.
translation.zh: 挺好的 我签下那个“老海军”的广告活动了

translation.en: That is incredible.
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna be traveling so much and you're already so busy.
translation.zh: 听我说 往后我会经常到处跑而你已经够忙了

translation.en: No. I'm not busy.
translation.zh: 不 我不忙

translation.en: I don't wanna be with a guy saving somebody else's seats.
translation.zh: 我不想跟一个帮别人占座的人在一起

translation.en: I want the guy whose seats are being saved, you know?

translation.en: -I think we should-- -No! [clearing throat]
translation.zh: -我想我们应该…-不！

translation.en: I know this is annoying...
translation.zh: 我知道这些事很烦人

translation.en: Ma'am, I would lay my life down for these. If you can't say the same, move on.
translation.zh: 女士 我愿为这几个座位付出生命如果你不敢说同样的话 请走开

translation.en: We can make this work.
translation.zh: 我们能有办法解决的

translation.en: I'm about to get promoted. My schedule will be easier.
translation.zh: 我就快升职了到时我的事情会轻松些

translation.en: Then our seats are gonna be saved.
translation.zh: 然后我们的座位就能留出来了

translation.en: I promise.

translation.zh: 和它玩 它很快就会死

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Well, men are kind of like that.
translation.zh: 男人就和这种情况差不多

translation.en: You put too much focus on him, he can sense it,
translation.zh: 你给它的关注太多 它能感觉到

translation.en: then you're gonna accidentally kill him. Then you gotta hide him in your drawer
translation.zh: 有一天你会意外地害死它然后你把它藏在你的抽屉里

translation.en: -so your mom doesn't find out. -I like my one salamander.
translation.zh: -不让你妈妈发现-我喜欢我的一只小蜥蜴

translation.en: Okay, let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧

translation.en: -Wait. We haven't even ordered yet. -Hello? No. I better get out of here.
translation.zh: -等等 我们都还没点餐呢-你好？不 我最好赶紧走

translation.en: -It's an emergency. -What?
translation.zh: -有急事-什么？

translation.en: -Well, I was just about to order and pay -[gasps] It's an emergency.
translation.zh: -我们都要点餐和结账了-是急事

translation.en: for my dinner at this very nice restaurant,
translation.zh: 这家餐厅非常好

translation.en: but I guess I'll just rush straight to the hospital.
translation.zh: 我看我就直接奔医院去吧

translation.en: -Thank you. -An emergency.
translation.zh: -谢谢-是急事

translation.en: Oh, my God, the whole leg?
translation.zh: 老天 整条腿吗？

translation.en: [Charlie] These things always happen when you least expect it.
translation.zh: 这种事总在你最意想不到的时候发生

translation.en: [waiter] I mean, I saw your phone not ring.
translation.zh: 我注意到你的电话没有响

translation.en: It's not legally a crime, but we both know this isn't right.
translation.zh: 虽然这不是犯罪但我们都知道这样不好

translation.en: Why do I only have a 2D printer? What am I, a caveman?
translation.zh: 为什么我只有一台二维打印机？我是洞穴人吗？

translation.en: There's too much paper here! This is the digital age!
translation.zh: 这里纸张太多了！现在是数码时代！

translation.en: I'll have you know, my tongue is no longer atrophied.
translation.zh: 我想告诉你 我的舌头不再萎缩了

translation.en: -Code red, code black, code-- Shit. -Code red, I can't tell what that means,
translation.zh: -红色警报 黑色警报 完蛋警报-什么红色警报 我不懂

translation.en: -but code shit, I feel like that's bad. -[Kirsten] Change of plans. I won't go out of town.
translation.zh: -但我感觉完蛋警报很不妙-计划改变 我不出城了

translation.en: Make sure they know the office has to be open all weekend.
translation.zh: 一定让所有人知道整个周末办公室照常工作

translation.en: Um, of course.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -Is everything okay? -Obviously. Why would you ask me that?
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-当然 为什么问我这种问题？

translation.en: Well, no reason.
translation.zh: 不为什么

translation.en: I am a successful woman. I don't need to travel
translation.zh: 我是个成功的女性 我不需要跟一个

translation.en: with a pathetic man-child who can't even feed himself.
translation.zh: 连饭都不会吃的可悲巨型儿童去旅行

translation.en: Of course not.
translation.zh: 你当然不需要

translation.en: Here's a riddle. Would you tell me you love Korean barbecue
translation.zh: 问个问题 如果你没吃过韩式烤肉连是什么都不知道

translation.en: if you've never had it and didn't know what it was?
translation.zh: 你会不会跟我说你喜欢吃？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: And if we went there, would you refuse to let me explain how it works,
translation.zh: 那在我们去吃的时候 你会不会连听都不听我解释该怎么吃

translation.en: eat raw meat, rather than admit you're wrong,
translation.zh: 宁可吃生肉也不肯承认自己错了

translation.en: and blame me when you threw it up on a hot grill?
translation.zh: 等你把肉吐到滚烫的烤架上时还来怪我？

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 绝对不会

translation.en: Kirsten, do you want your--? No, okay.
translation.zh: 克尔斯汀 你要不要…不要 好的

translation.en: A lot of men proposed to me in my 20s. I could be thrice divorced by now.
translation.zh: 我二十来岁时大把男人跟我求婚到现在我可能都离了三次婚了

translation.en: But I'm not gonna pretend to let him teach me about how the world works
translation.zh: 但我不会假装愿意让他来教我这个世界是怎么运转的

translation.en: just so he can get it up!
translation.zh: 就为了满足他 让他能勃起！

translation.en: He's such a jerk.
translation.zh: 他太混蛋了

translation.en: I'm worried that your abrasiveness and general demeanor
translation.zh: 我担心你粗糙和平庸的表现

translation.en: will hinder you in the workplace.
translation.zh: 会成为你在职场上的阻碍

translation.en: You put a plate full of raw beef in front of me,
translation.zh: 你把满满一盘生牛肉放在我面前

translation.en: I think it's tartare, and I'm the idiot? [scoffs]
translation.zh: 我以为这是鞑靼牛肉我就成傻子了？

translation.en: I'm sorry if I expect my food to be properly cooked
translation.zh: 很抱歉我不过是希望在我坐进一家餐厅时

translation.en: whilst I sit in a restaurant. What am I, a chef? Uh-uh.
translation.zh: 呈给我的食物是经过烹饪的你以为我是什么 厨子吗？

translation.en: -Do I got a Michelin star? -You could if you wanted to.
translation.zh: -我有米其林星吗？-你愿意的话你也能有

translation.en: She did this shit on purpose to make me look stupid.
translation.zh: 她故意干这种事叫我出丑

translation.en: This was a power play.
translation.zh: 她要在我面前展示强权

translation.en: I don't think she tried to power play.
translation.zh: 我觉得她不是想展示强权

translation.en: Can't get the image of barbecued vomit out of my head now.
translation.zh: 怎么也赶不走我脑袋里那副烧烤呕吐物的画面

translation.en: This shitty computer isn't taking my password.
translation.zh: 这台破电脑不认我的密码了

translation.en: -That's my-- -Take my password!
translation.zh: -那是我的…-认我的密码！

translation.en: That's my laptop.
translation.zh: 那是我的电脑

translation.en: Bring me my laptop.
translation.zh: 把我的电脑拿来

translation.en: How could you let them pick the restaurant?
translation.zh: 你怎么能让他们自己选餐厅？

translation.en: -It was your turn to choose. -No, you chose last time.
translation.zh: -这次该你选的-不 上次是你选的

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Rick is worse than before.
translation.zh: 瑞克比从前更糟了

translation.en: -He tried to fire a mailman today. -My God.
translation.zh: -他今天想炒掉一个邮递员-我的天

translation.en: -Mailmen work for the U.S. government. -Get them together before they kill us.
translation.zh: -邮递员是为美国政府工作的-在我们被杀死之前让他们和好

translation.en: I can feel it in my bones that Kirsten is capable of murder.
translation.zh: 我打从骨子里认为克尔斯汀敢杀人

translation.en: -[exhales] So, what are we gonna do? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -那我们该怎么办？-不知道

translation.en: It's your turn to figure something out.
translation.zh: 轮到你想点办法了

translation.en: Why isn't there anything in my calendar at 2 p.m.?
translation.zh: 为什么我下午两点什么安排也没有？

translation.en: You know I need a hard out after family events.
translation.zh: 你知道我参加完家庭活动后需要认真做件事

translation.en: Oh, my. I'm so sorry. I didn't know that your lunch was with family.
translation.zh: 老天 对不起 我不知道你是和家人一起吃的午饭

translation.en: -I'll figure it out right now. -If I pay you to make my life easier,
translation.zh: -我现在来安排-我雇你来是为了让生活轻松

translation.en: but instead, you make it harder, you're useless to me.
translation.zh: 可情况却正相反那你对我来说就没有用了

translation.en: Do you understand?
translation.zh: 明白了吗？

translation.en: So, bad news is, Kirsten ripped me a new one.
translation.zh: 坏消息是 克尔斯汀狠狠地伤了我

translation.en: Good news is I now have time to see Golf Guy.
translation.zh: 好消息是我现在有时间去约会高尔夫男了

translation.en: -Mm. -What is this? Charlie?
translation.zh: 这是什么？查理？

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -This is Rick's son's science project.
translation.zh: -我的天-这是瑞克儿子的科学作业

translation.en: Life gave me lemons, and I used it to battery-power lemonade.
translation.zh: 生活给了我柠檬我就把它们做成充电柠檬汁

translation.en: Can you... fix it?
translation.zh: 你能修好吗？

translation.en: No. It was a masterpiece, and now he's not even getting a ribbon.
translation.zh: 不行 这本来是杰作但现在它连一条勋带都得不到了

translation.en: Go, get out of here. Save yourself.
translation.zh: 走吧 离开这 拯救你自己

translation.en: -Good luck. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -祝你好运-谢谢

translation.en: We need a new project. Whole new thing.
translation.zh: 我们需要一个新方案 全新的东西

translation.en: -Yeah. -What about Golf Guy?
translation.zh: -是的-那高尔夫男怎么办？

translation.en: I don't wanna squeeze my salamander too hard.
translation.zh: 我不想把我的小蜥蜴捏得太紧

translation.en: I honestly did not know that someone could do this to lemons with their bare hands.
translation.zh: 我之前并不知道有人凭一双手就能把柠檬弄得这么厉害

translation.en: [Charlie laughing] Rick was so pissed.
translation.zh: 瑞克气坏了

translation.en: Imagine if a duck were on meth, it was like, "Hey, Charlie. Charlie."
translation.zh: 想象一下一只磕了药的鸭子他就一直喊“喂 查理”

translation.en: -Sounded like that duck. -Why do you work for this guy?
translation.zh: -听起来有点像那种鸭子-你为什么要替这家伙干活？

translation.en: -Why don't you just... quit? -Are you insane?
translation.zh: -为什么不辞职？-你疯了吗？

translation.en: I've spent three years doing every shit errand imaginable.
translation.zh: 我用了三年时间 把你能想到的所有破差事都做了一遍

translation.en: Can't quit.
translation.zh: 我不能辞职

translation.en: I'd have to start all over, and all of this would've been a waste.
translation.zh: 不然就得全部从头开始这之前的一切都白费了

translation.en: Plus, Rick is the most respected VC of all time, so if he makes me an analyst,
translation.zh: 再说 瑞克是最有名望的风险投资家如果他能让我当上分析师

translation.en: -I can get a job anywhere. -But do you like the actual work?
translation.zh: -我到哪都能找到工作-但工作本身你喜欢吗？

translation.en: Nobody likes the actual work. That's the job.
translation.zh: 没人喜欢工作本身 这就是工作

translation.en: Do the best one where you make the most money. Hmm.
translation.zh: 成为最顶尖的 就能赚最多的钱

translation.en: Okay, why do you work for Kirsten?
translation.zh: 那你又为什么给克尔斯汀打工？

translation.en: I work for Kirsten because I wanna write the articles that made me cry
translation.zh: 我给她打工是因为我想写那种让儿时的我感动到流泪的文章

translation.en: when I was a little girl, and Kirsten's the best sports journalist there is.
translation.zh: 克尔斯汀是最好的体育记者了

translation.en: Well, has she read any of your stuff?
translation.zh: 她看过你写的文章吗？

translation.en: I haven't written anything or finished writing anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都没写或者说没有写完任何东西

translation.en: My days are so long and so exhausting
translation.zh: 我一天那么多事 那么累

translation.en: it's like when I have time, everything I write is... bad.
translation.zh: 好像当我有时间时我写出来的所有东西 都很糟糕

translation.en: -That is probably not true. -It is true.
translation.zh: -可能事实不是这样的-就是这样的

translation.en: I think I wanted to impress her and I wanted her to like me,
translation.zh: 我本来想给她留下好印象希望她喜欢我

translation.en: so, it's just like, I worked so hard at being this great assistant
translation.zh: 所以我努力地工作当一个出色的助理

translation.en: and making sure she was happy that...
translation.zh: 确保她什么都满意 然后…

translation.en: I don't know, feels like I might have lost any writing skill I ever had.
translation.zh: 我也不知道了我可能失去了所有的写作技能

translation.en: Well, that is definitely not true.
translation.zh: 这些绝对不是事实

translation.en: You're a terrible assistant.
translation.zh: 你是个糟糕的助理

translation.en: Can you pass me a few of those?
translation.zh: 递几根棉棒给我好吗？

translation.en: -You ready? -I'm ready.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗？-准备好了

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不是吧？-是的

translation.en: Holy shit. How does that work?
translation.zh: 见鬼了 这是什么原理？

translation.en: Well, the bonds in the milk connect with the DNA in the--
translation.zh: 牛奶中的化学键和颜料的…

translation.en: I have no idea. I'm not a scientist.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我又不是科学家

translation.en: All the supplies are in the bag. Feels like a winner.
translation.zh: 所有材料都在包里 真有冠军的感觉

translation.en: This isn't as good as the lemons.
translation.zh: 这个还不如柠檬那个好

translation.en: [Charlie over phone] He wasn't happy, but he didn't break anything,
translation.zh: 他不满意 但没有砸东西

translation.en: -so, maybe that's an improvement. -[Harper] Well, technically, he's right,
translation.zh: -也许这是个进步-严格来说 他是对的

translation.en: but given the fact that we did that in the night,
translation.zh: 但考虑到我们头天晚上做出的效果

translation.en: -Magic Milk should win a Nobel Prize. -[Rick] Charlie!
translation.zh: -魔法牛奶应该拿诺贝尔奖-查理！

translation.en: -Oh, my God. I think Rick's drunk. -What?
translation.zh: -老天 瑞克好像喝醉了-什么？

translation.en: I've never seen him drunk before. He's violent when he's sober.
translation.zh: 我从没见他喝醉过他清醒的时候倒是很暴力

translation.en: -Charlie--? -[line disconnects]
translation.zh: 查理？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Do it with me, white boy.
translation.zh: -好吧-和我一起跳 白人小子

translation.en: Yeah. Get over here, you dig it? Come on, man.
translation.zh: 给我过来 听到没？过来 伙计

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来啊

translation.en: [singing] Charlie chicken and grits
translation.zh: 查理燕麦配小鸡

translation.en: You don't know that shit.
translation.zh: 你不会这玩意

translation.en: You're a good guy.
translation.zh: 你是个好人

translation.en: Do you know that?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: -For real. -What?
translation.zh: -是真的-什么？

translation.en: I appreciate you.
translation.zh: 我欣赏你

translation.en: And I should tell you that more often.
translation.zh: 我应该多跟你说这句话

translation.en: Good idea. Let's have another drink.
translation.zh: 好主意 我们再喝一杯

translation.en: -Okay. -Oh, no. No, no, no. I got it.
translation.zh: -好吧-别 我来吧

translation.en: I hate losing, Charlie.
translation.zh: 我讨厌输 查理

translation.en: And she thinks I'm a loser.
translation.zh: 她觉得我是个失败者

translation.en: What should I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: You're a person.
translation.zh: 你是人

translation.en: What would you do?
translation.zh: 你会怎么做？

translation.en: -Apologize. -No. Next.
translation.zh: -道歉-不 下一个

translation.en: Tell her she's good at her job. Tell her you respect what she does.
translation.zh: 告诉她 她工作很出色告诉她你敬重她所做的事

translation.en: Just tell her you see her.
translation.zh: 告诉她 你看到她了

translation.en: -What does that even mean? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -这是什么意思？-我不知道

translation.en: I think maybe it's just... Maybe it's just what I'd wanna hear.
translation.zh: 我想可能这是我会想听到的话

translation.en: Hmm?
translation.zh: （喝醉的瑞克过去了别让他看到你）

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好啊

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -[clears throat]
translation.zh: 你来干什么？

translation.en: I see you.
translation.zh: 我看到你了

translation.en: What? What does that even mean?
translation.zh: 什么？这是什么意思？

translation.en: I see you.
translation.zh: 我看到你了

translation.en: "I see you," like--
translation.zh: “我看到你了”就像…

translation.en: I see you.
translation.zh: 我看到你了

translation.en: -Oh. Lock the door. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 把门锁上

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 遵命 女士

translation.en: I meant that as a joke.
translation.zh: 我是开玩笑的

translation.en: You're the boss.
translation.zh: 你是头儿

translation.en: Let's go to your apartment. I'm serious. [laughs]
translation.zh: 去你家里再说 我是认真的

translation.en: Rick.
translation.zh: 瑞克

translation.en: -[Harper] Charlie? -I want rose petals everywhere.
translation.zh: -查理？-我要到处都撒上玫瑰花瓣

translation.en: I need it to look like a massacre at a flower shop.
translation.zh: 我要那里看起来像屠杀鲜花店的现场

translation.en: Nantucket is a go. They land in an hour, I put the champagne
translation.zh: 南塔克特岛已经准备好了他们一小时后着陆

translation.en: -on Rick's credit card. Here you go. -Hotel room is all set.
translation.zh: -我用瑞克的信用卡买了香槟 给你-酒店房间都布置好了

translation.en: -It's about to be Boner City in there. -Wow, okay.
translation.zh: -那里马上就要成极乐城了-好的

translation.en: Someone say Boner City? Frigging love that place.
translation.zh: 有人说极乐城了吗？我超喜欢那地方

translation.en: Harper, this is Duncan. My roommate.
translation.zh: 哈珀 这是我室友邓肯

translation.en: He's a teacher at a middle school in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 他是布朗克斯一所中学的老师

translation.en: But he's gay, so, keep your ovaries in your pants.
translation.zh: 但他是同性恋所以不要释放出你的欲望

translation.en: -I'll just shove them back in there. -[Charlie] What are you--?
translation.zh: -那我只好把欲望塞回去了-你怎么？

translation.en: -Why are you dressed like that? -For Becca's engagement party tonight.
translation.zh: -为什么打扮成这样？-我要参加贝卡今晚的订婚派对

translation.en: What are you wearing? Where are the rest of your shorts?
translation.zh: 你穿的又是什么？你短裤怎么少了一截？

translation.en: These are cool, all right? Suze likes short shorts on guys.
translation.zh: 这种很酷 好吗？苏丝就喜欢男人穿超短裤

translation.en: -Stop. -[laughing] Your shorts suck.
translation.zh: -不准笑-你短裤太烂了

translation.en: You know what, stop it. You're not friends.
translation.zh: 你们少来了 你俩又不是朋友

translation.en: -I feel like we're becoming friends. -We're friends.
translation.zh: -我觉得我们正在成为朋友-我们是朋友

translation.en: -Do you wanna come to this party? -I don't think so.
translation.zh: -你要来参加这个派对吗？-还是算了吧

translation.en: I gotta finish writing this article to distract myself.
translation.zh: 我想回家写完我的文章好让自己分分心

translation.en: Distract yourself from what?
translation.zh: 你为什么要分心？

translation.en: The fact that Golf Guy hasn't called me in a few days.
translation.zh: 那个高尔夫男几天没联系我了

translation.en: -Like zero contact? -Yeah, but he'll call me soon,
translation.zh: -什么联系也没有？-是的 但是他很快就会找我了

translation.en: 'cause he said he was gonna come to Becca's party tonight.
translation.zh: 因为他说过今晚会去参加贝卡的派对

translation.en: -Whatever. It's not like I care. -It's gonna be fun.
translation.zh: -随便了 我也不关心-这派对会很好玩的

translation.en: -Duncan? -[Duncan] Free booze and hot dogs.
translation.zh: -邓肯？-免费酒水和热狗

translation.en: -You've convinced me. I'll be there. -Perfect. She's my plus one.
translation.zh: -好吧 你说服我了 我去-太好了 她是我的女伴

translation.en: You're my plus one. I'm Suze's plus one. You're a plus two.
translation.zh: 你是我的男伴 我是苏丝的男伴你已经是二号男伴了

translation.en: -So, she's my plus three. -I'm his plus three.
translation.zh: -那她就是我的三号女伴-我是三号

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [announcer] DJ JC, kicking it live on the dance floor.
translation.zh: DJ杰西在舞池引领狂欢

translation.en: -Yes! -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -太棒了！-老天

translation.en: -[Charlie] You see all the hot guys? -[Duncan] Don't do that.
translation.zh: -看到这里的帅哥了吗？-别这样

translation.en: Everybody's so tan. Oh, my goodness. Look at you. You look so pretty.
translation.zh: 大家都好…我的老天瞧瞧你 美极了

translation.en: I don't wanna do this anymore, Suze.

translation.en: But you're my backup.

translation.en: You know what?

translation.en: Order whatever you want, on me.

translation.en: What am I doing? You're not my girlfriend anymore. Give me that.

translation.en: I'm not Rockefeller.

translation.en: Harper. You were right.

translation.en: We can't let them do this. I'm going to JFK.

translation.en: Meet me at the terminal.

translation.en: It's the cheap one.

translation.en: Don't have time. Leaving the coat.

translation.en: I need a taxi. I gotta get to the airport right now.

translation.en: I gotta stop someone from getting married. Flight leaves in-- Oh.

translation.en: I got, like, four hours.

translation.en: And we've been to Times Square. What about museums? Should we go to the Met?

translation.en: Do you like beautiful art that makes you re-examine what it means to be human?
translation.zh: 不知道 你喜欢看那些美丽的艺术品让自己重审作为人类的意义吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Then, yeah. The Met's worth it.
translation.zh: -喜欢啊-那行 可以去大都会艺术博物馆

translation.en: In fact, it may still be open if you go right-- Oh, my God.

translation.en: I did the over-dick-around thing.

translation.en: Sorry.

translation.en: Rick?

translation.en: Hey. Did I forget something?

translation.en: Yeah. That you're a bastard.

translation.en: I don't wanna be like you. I'm not gonna be.

translation.en: I don't want the promotion. I quit.

translation.en: Okay.

translation.en: Kirsten? Don't marry him.

translation.en: Do it, honey. Go with the young guy.

translation.en: Oh, no. No, no.

translation.en: I mean, she's a very handsome woman. Just--

translation.en: -Not what's going on here. -Charlie. You're fired as fuck.

translation.en: I literally just quit.

translation.en: Kirsten, I know you don't know me, but I know you,

translation.en: because all Harper does is talk about you.

translation.en: And even when she's complaining about you, she's really complimenting you.

translation.en: I know how hard you work and what a badass you are,

translation.en: and I know you don't put up with any shit. So, don't put up with his.

translation.en: I don't know what you think you're getting out of this, but you deserve better.

translation.en: You are better.

translation.en: Oh, my God. Gave myself goose bumps.

translation.en: He's crazy. You realize that?

translation.en: What's my favorite food?

translation.en: Your favorite-- It's steak tartare.

translation.en: It's green curry, you douche-tard.

translation.en: She likes it medium-spicy from Thai Leaf on Broadway.
translation.zh: 她喜欢百老汇街上泰叶店里的中辣味

translation.en: What's my favorite place?

translation.en: Kiki, I ca-- [clears throat]

translation.en: This is ridiculous.

translation.en: Why are we--?

translation.en: Kirsten.
translation.zh: 克尔斯汀

translation.en: Your name is Kirsten.

translation.en: Squam Lake, New Hampshire, you douche-tard.

translation.en: but could you please strike "wedding" from his calendar?

translation.en: Absolutely.

translation.en: Are you being serious?

translation.en: No. Kiki's short for Kirsten.

translation.en: I finished.

translation.en: I finished.
translation.zh: 我写完了

translation.en: The whole article.

translation.en: I finished it. I finished the whole thing.

translation.en: You, sir, are a hero and scholar,

translation.en: and are about to receive the greatest tip in the history of the service industry.

translation.en: Technically, I don't have my wallet on me. Tomorrow--

translation.en: Leave this place and never return.

translation.en: [whispers] I did it.

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -What do you want? -You live here?

translation.en: It's disgusting.

translation.en: Hold up. Hold up, hold up.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I just--

translation.en: I need some information on, uh, my wife. My ex-wife.

translation.en: Like what?

translation.en: I got some written down here. Uh, assorted favorites,

translation.en: as in, uh, favorite foods,

translation.en: -flowers, clothing-- -Are you serious?

translation.en: Look, I realize I should know this. But you used to do all this stuff for me.

translation.en: I want her back.

translation.en: I have an old Kiki file.

translation.en: -I'll send it over to you. -[exhales]

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Thank you.

translation.en: -I really appreciate this. -Rick.

translation.en: It's soy. Nice seeing you, Rick.

translation.en: [Charlie] Bye, Rick.

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh.

translation.en: Thank God you're here.

translation.en: I can't find that piece on lesbian soccer players in Nigeria.

translation.en: Probably in your "deleted" folder.

translation.en: -I can't find Julie's number. -You made me change it
translation.zh: -我找不到朱莉的电话号码了-你让我把她的名字

translation.en: -to Satan in your contacts. -Come back to work.
translation.zh: -改成了撒旦-回来工作吧

translation.en: What?

translation.en: You crossed every line ever. I genuinely considered setting you up
translation.zh: 你越过了各种底线我确实考虑过起诉你

translation.en: for white-collar crime and just letting you rot in jail.

translation.en: But I understand in some ways what you were trying to do.

translation.en: You're not an unintelligent person.

translation.en: I don't know how you did all this. This place is falling apart without you.

translation.en: Come back and do it with me.

translation.en: I learned so much from you.

translation.en: You're my hero.

translation.en: But if I wanna actually be a writer, I have to stop making excuses not to write.

translation.en: So, I can't be your assistant.

translation.en: But I'd love to help you find a new one.

translation.en: You're fired again.

translation.en: -I have to get my stuff. This is awkward. -Have you written anything?

translation.en: Have I written anything? Yes. I have written something.

translation.en: It's just-- It's right here.

translation.en: Let's go over it.

translation.en: -Tell me something I don't know. -Okay.

translation.en: -"Twilight Champions." -Yeah, but that title is--

translation.en: -No, I like it. I love the title. -I like it, too. I could like it.

translation.en: This is about the geriatric Olympiads?

translation.en: If I spend too much time on Gilda in the beginning,

translation.en: people will know that she's gonna die. Let her death be a twist.

translation.en: Hold off until after Harry wins his first med--

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: So, what are you doing here?

translation.en: Oh, Kirsten told me to meet her. What are you doing here?

translation.en: Oh, my God.

translation.en: -She Cyrano'd us. -Yes, she--
translation.zh: -她情圣助攻了我们-是的 她…

translation.en: I Googled it. So, I know what it means now.

translation.en: Why are you dressed like that?

translation.en: I don't work here anymore. I quit working for Rick.
translation.zh: 我不在这里工作了我辞掉了瑞克那里的工作

translation.en: Starting over. At 28.

translation.en: Actually, I'm a temp, which is technically lower
translation.zh: 说起来 其实我是临时雇员严格说来比助理

translation.en: on the totem pole than an assistant, which is kind of a kick in the nuts.

translation.en: But it's, um, kind of cool. I get to see a bunch of different jobs.

translation.en: Find out what I actually like.

translation.en: I like you.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你

translation.en: So, so much.

translation.en: You're not hard to get at all.

translation.en: You're hard to earn.

translation.en: It's so much better.

translation.en: You displayed a total lack of character when it mattered.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: Charlie, you have the romantic and sexual personality of a seventh-grader.

translation.en: Seventh? I feel like it'd be at least high school.

translation.en: You wear suits to sports games.
translation.zh: 你穿着西装去看体育比赛

translation.en: What?

translation.en: You're a know-it-all.

translation.en: You are unbelievably bad at beer pong.

translation.en: You're a sore winner. And you use too many exclamation points.

translation.en: And yet...
translation.zh: 可是…

translation.en: I feel joy.
translation.zh: 我感到很快乐

translation.en: Maybe I love love in open spaces, too.
translation.zh: 也许我也喜欢在公众场合的爱情
